content: PFF Panel 4 Investments Seedly PFF 2019 Asked by Benny TanAsked on 02 Mar 2019What do you think of 'peer tracker' investment platforms such as Zulu where you invest in accordance someone else's strategy? ?2 answersAnswerBump1

Benny TanLevel 3. WonderkidAnswered on 05 Mar 2019Thanks, Dawn - that's a very self-reliant way of doing it.0 comments0

Dawn FionaLevel 5. GeniusAnswered on 04 Mar 2019Depends only if you believe in that person's investment strategy. And then you've to ask yourself, if you follow the wrong person, then will you accept the consequences for it?That's why I always base it against myself and no one else.0 comments0
